channel.title: Pvprampage(pkbased with eco)
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/cooltext1056267886_zpsccf3631d.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"]Have you ever wanted a server that was pvp based but still had a economy? If so pvprampage has what your looking for. Outside banks are pvp zones with correct timers. Theres few Safezones which include training area, Skilling Zone, Bosses, Banks and frost dragons.[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Features * Great PvP system and PkP system * PvP timers so your opponent cant just run to safety *100% Skilling for the ECO * Lamps that give PKPS instead of XP *100% working curses including leeches * Klin cape torva Steads & more * Zaryte bow with special attack * working Armadyl Storm with Armadyl Battle staff * Active forums *24/7 uptime *Balanced combat system * Friendly Staff and community *vote4cash/points/pkp system *& plenty more![/CENTER]
[COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Why Choose pvprampage compared to any other pvp server? We strive to keep our players happy and any suggestions will NOT go unawnserd we put every suggestion to thought We also are not here for the $$ if you choose to donate we appreciate it but we do not force it upon anyone nor are we looking to make profit off the game we simply want to make players happy and most importantly have fun with developing the server.[/CENTER][/COLOR]
[CENTER][COLOR="#FF0000"][SIZE=5]Links[/SIZE][/COLOR] Website:[URL=http://"http://www.pvprampage.enjin.com"]http://www.pvprampage.enjin.com[/URL] Webclient:[URL=http://"http://www.pvprampage.enjin.com/webclient"]http://www.pvprampage.enjin.com/webclient[/URL] [/CENTER]
[SPOILER=Media][IMG]http://[CENTER] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/rocktailfishing_zpsea057762.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/pickpocket_zpsdd43dd00.png[/img][IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/oredisapear_zps98f0fc01.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/thieveingstalls_zpsb496ee7e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/trainyourstats_zps33c0fc90.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/Nex_zpsa5bbbb20.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/mining_zps6c6f74af.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/magicbows_zps8fc680e1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/farming_zps5f67ae5b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/zarytespec_zps57f70094.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/Vestaspec_zps61f5d3bc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/clawsspec_zps53aea57f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/armastorm_zpsb6273bb0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo320/jalyn1993/clawsspec_zps53aea57f.png[/img][/CENTER][/SPOILER]

item.title: Pvprampage(pkbased with eco)
item.dc:creator: @serenityxx serenityxx
item.description:
@serenityxx wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"]Have you ever wanted a server that was pvp based but still had a economy? If so pvprampage has what your looking for.
Outside banks are pvp zones with correct timers. Theres few Safezones which include training area, Skilling Zone, Bosses, Banks and frost dragons.[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Features

  • Great PvP system and PkP system
  • PvP timers so your opponent cant just run to safety
    *100% Skilling for the ECO
  • Lamps that give PKPS instead of XP
    *100% working curses including leeches
  • Klin cape torva Steads & more
  • Zaryte bow with special attack
  • working Armadyl Storm with Armadyl Battle staff
  • Active forums
    *24/7 uptime
    *Balanced combat system
  • Friendly Staff and community
    *vote4cash/points/pkp system
    *& plenty more![/CENTER]

[COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Why Choose pvprampage compared to any other pvp server?
We strive to keep our players happy and any suggestions will NOT go unawnserd we put every suggestion to thought
We also are not here for the $$ if you choose to donate we appreciate it but we do not force it upon anyone nor are we looking
to make profit off the game we simply want to make players happy and most importantly have fun with developing the server.[/CENTER][/COLOR]

[CENTER][COLOR="#FF0000"][SIZE=5]Links[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Website:http://www.pvprampage.enjin.com
Webclient:http://www.pvprampage.enjin.com/webclient
[/CENTER]
